Package com.squareup.picasso

Interface Summary
Cache A memory cache for storing the most recently used images.
Loader A mechanism to load images from external resources such as a disk cache and/or the internet.
Target Represents an arbitrary listener for image loading.
Transformation Image transformation.
 

Class Summary
Loader.Response Response stream and info.
LruCache A memory cache which uses a least-recently used eviction policy.
OkHttpLoader A Loader which uses OkHttp to download images.
Picasso Image downloading, transformation, and caching manager.
Picasso.Builder Fluent API for creating Picasso instances.
RequestBuilder Fluent API for building an image download request.
StatsSnapshot Represents all stats for a Picasso instance at a single point in time.
UrlConnectionLoader A Loader which uses HttpURLConnection to download images.
